reviewText: I ordered this DVD and yes its pricey so I waited for my husband to buy it for Christmas. It totally was over priced!!! For that price I wish their was more. Hope I could save others from the same mistake I recommend that you find something on you tube. Don't get me wrong theirs decent info but I feel I got cheated $40 . it was not worth $60. This should be a rental because it's not fare that they are selling this for that price.  Also,  The guy is obnoxious threw out the dvd.
This is a great tutorial. The concepts and fundamentals translate well between all different mediums.

DON'T BUY IF U R IN UK [LONDON].  STUNG WITH $30 IMPORT TAX.  ALTOGETHER COST OF $90

WHAT A F*****G RIP-OFF.

DVD BETTER SHOW SOMETHING THAT I DON'T KNOW OR I"LL POST IT BACK WITH SOME KY.
Ottimo DVD! Jordu  un vero maestro.

I have been sculpting for 20 years and could not believe how many tips and techniques I learned from this wonderful DVD. Jordu Schell is  an amazing artist. Best money I have spent and hope he comes  out with another.

I got this for my son, who wanted to practice his skill as an experiment.

The DVD arrived well before the estimated date, so it was great.

But unfortunately It wouldn't work on my PC which got windows 8 and thankfully my son got windows Vista, and it worked.
